Utilities.html#/s:6Bitski9randomHexSSSi1.name: randomHex(bytesCount:)
Utilities.html#/s:6Bitski9randomHexSSSi1.abstract: Generate a random hex value of a given byte size

Protocols/TransactionWatcherDelegate.htm.name: transactionWatcher(_:didReceiveReceipt:)
Protocols/TransactionWatcherDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when the transaction receipt is receieved

Protocols/TransactionWatcherDelegate.htm.name: transactionWatcher(_:didReceiveEvent:)
Protocols/TransactionWatcherDelegate.htm.abstract: Called when an instance of an event being watched is received

Classes/TransactionWatcher/Status.html#/.name: pending
Classes/TransactionWatcher/Status.html#/.abstract: A transaction that has not yet been mined

Classes/TransactionWatcher/Status.html#/.name: approved
Classes/TransactionWatcher/Status.html#/.abstract: A transaction that has been mined, along with how many blocks have been mined afterwards

Classes/TransactionWatcher/Status.html#/.name: successful
Classes/TransactionWatcher/Status.html#/.abstract: A transaction deemed successful (enough blocks have been mined that it is not likely to be reverted)

Classes/TransactionWatcher/Status.html#/.name: failed
Classes/TransactionWatcher/Status.html#/.abstract: A transaction that could not be mined or was reverted

Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.name: DidReceiveEvent
Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: Called when the TransactionWatcher receives an event

Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.name: MatchedEventKey
Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: The user info key for the received event

Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.name: transactionHash
Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: The transaction hash, received from submitting the transaction

Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.name: blockNumber
Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: Block number the transaction was initially confirmed in

Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.name: expectedConfirmations
Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: Number of confirmations to require before marking as successful.

Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.name: pollInterval
Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: How often to check for new blocks

Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.name: watchedEvents
Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: Events that we are expecting may be returned

Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.name: startWatching(for:)
Classes/TransactionWatcher.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: Watches for a provided event from the receipt’s logs

Classes/TransactionWatcher.html.name: TransactionWatcher
Classes/TransactionWatcher.html.abstract: A class that allows you to watch a transaction for events and block confirmations.

Protocols/TransactionWatcherDelegate.htm.name: TransactionWatcherDelegate
Protocols/TransactionWatcherDelegate.htm.abstract: A class that will receive updates about a transaction.

Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html#/s.name: noDelegate
Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html#/s.abstract: The provider is not configured with an authDelegate

Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html#/s.name: requestCancelled
Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html#/s.abstract: The transaction was canceled by the user

Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html#/s.name: missingData
Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html#/s.abstract: The JSON-RPC request is missing a result

Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html#/s.name: invalidResponseCode
Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html#/s.abstract: The server returned an unexpected response code

Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html.name: Error
Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider/Error.html.abstract: Various errors that may occur while processing Web3 requests

Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider.html#/s:6Bits.name: headers
Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: HTTP headers to add to all requests

Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider.html#/s:6Bits.name: send(request:response:)
Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider.html#/s:6Bits.abstract: Sends an RPCRequest and parses the result

Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider.html.name: BitskiHTTPProvider
Classes/BitskiHTTPProvider.html.abstract: A custom Web3 HttpProvider that is specifically configured for use with Bitski.

Classes/Bitski/AuthenticationError.html#.name: notLoggedIn
Classes/Bitski/AuthenticationError.html#.abstract: Returned when trying to make a web3 request while logged out

Classes/Bitski/AuthenticationError.html#.name: noAccessToken
Classes/Bitski/AuthenticationError.html#.abstract: Returned when an access token is not received while logging in

Classes/Bitski.html#/s:6BitskiAAC20Logge.name: LoggedInNotification
Classes/Bitski.html#/s:6BitskiAAC20Logge.abstract: Notification triggered when the user logs in

Classes/Bitski.html#/s:6BitskiAAC21Logge.name: LoggedOutNotification
Classes/Bitski.html#/s:6BitskiAAC21Logge.abstract: Notification triggered when the user logs out

Classes/Bitski.html#/s:6BitskiAAC10isLog.name: isLoggedIn
Classes/Bitski.html#/s:6BitskiAAC10isLog.abstract: Whether or not the current user is logged in
